titles: Immediate addresse vnto God alone First deliuered in a sermon before his Maiestie at Windsore. Since reuised and inlarged to a just treatise of inuocation of saints. Occasioned by a false imputation of M. Antonius De Dominis vpon the authour, Richard Montagu.
author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Matthew Lownes and William Barret,
notes: Running title reads: A treatise of the inuocation of saints.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: De Dominis, Marco Antonio, 1560-1624 --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Christian saints --  Cult --  Early works to 1800.
